column4: Hey all.  I'm wondering if there's a program/application for ubuntu out there that can give me a better way to watch log files for new entries.  I'm specifically having to deal with apache error logs, but it'd be nice to get something that can watch other logs as well.
Hmm.. being somewhat new to ubuntu, I haven't needed to use tail up to this point.  How would you use it to watch log files?
Nevermind.  I'll look at it online, and I'll come back with questions if I have any.
